Name: Another World Quest
About the game: Build Your Deck At the beginning of the game you need to choose one of the three camps to build a powerful deck (a deck must be full of 30 cards before it can be used). The three camps represent three different ideas of card sets, three leaders, and three different traverser paths. Players can freely choose to use cards from the camps or neutral cards depending on the effects of the cards. 【Wolfraid Clan】A fast attack deck consisting of a large number of cheap, high-quality creatures and spells that deal direct damage. 【Church of the Holy Blood】A midrange deck that focuses on strengthening the attack and defense of quality creatures, specializing in group enhancement spells. 【Aurora Fleet】 A fast summoning high cost creatures through creature acceleration or spell acceleration. The remaining four camps will be unlocked as the plot progresses. Enhance and fight Each time you get a victory you get gold and pieces. Gold can be used to buy supplement packs in the store to enhance your deck. Shards can be used to generate the cards you need directly, or you can get shards by destroying cards you don't need. Even if you fail, you can still get a lot of Coin. Try to build a powerful deck! Tales from the traveler The continent of Fran is a land of perennial comet falls. These comets bring powerful magical power to enhance the monster, resulting in the human living in this land suffered the end of the disaster. At the same time, the comet also has the energy to open the portal. Many travellers were thus transported to this other world. Of course, the portal can not only transport travellers, but also transport those other world's frightening monster ...... As a traveler, you will choose to lead the people back to the original world? Or stay and build the other world? ...... or use the power of the comet to rule the world?
Developers: 绝不可能的异世界企划委员会
